21110.「しかし 悪い予感が 的中したのでアール……。\n こんなにも早く ヤツが現れる:
But my bad premonition was right on the money
and... we didn't expect him to show up so
soon.

21111.「……ところで <pc>は\n こんな所に 何をしにきたのでアールか？:
...By the way, what is <pc> doing
here?

21112.「……ふむ。ホッツィ親方が\n この辺りで 魔物に襲われたから\n その調査に来:
Hmmm...hmmm. Hotzi was attacked by a
monster around here, so we came to
investigate.

21113.「……ホッツィ親方を襲ったのは\n あの魔物に まちがいないだろうね。\n ボク:
I'm sure it was that monster that attacked
Hotzi. We came here after him.

21114.「あの魔物の名は 魔獣ビュブロス……。\n クチから発する光線で 人の魂を\n:
The monster's name is Magical Beast Byblos, a terrifying creature that lives by sucking the souls out of people with rays of light it
emits from it's mouth.

21115.「あそこで ぬけがらのように倒れてる旅人は\n その光線を くらっちゃったんだね:
The traveler lying there like a dead fish must
have been exposed to that ray... poor guy...

21116.「……ビュブロスは モガリム街道に向かった。\n このまま 放っておけば ヤツは:
Byblos headed for Mogarim Highway. If left
unchecked, he will attack the Town of Agrani
in search of souls in great numbers.

21117.「……だが そうはさせん。\n ヤツは わしと この杖が なんとかする。\n ホ:
But I won't let that happen. I and my staff
will take care of him. Tell Hotzi not to
worry.

21118.「それでは また会おう。: Well then, I'll see you again.

21119.「ルナナ！ お前みたいな はねっ返りが\n 今さら アグラニに 何しにきやがった:
Lunana! What's a rebellious soul like
you doing in Agrani after all these years?

21120.「なんですって……！？\n 誰のおかげで この町が再興したと思ってんの？\n 全:
What the hell...! Who do you think is
responsible for the revival of this town? It's
all thanks to me!

21122.「今日は それに対する 礼状を書いてもらうわ。\n アグラニを救った英雄！ とで:
Today, I'm going to ask you to write a thank- you note for that. The hero who saved Agrani! I'm sure the world will naturally look
at me with a title like "Hero who saved Agrani!

21123.「か～っ！ なに言ってやがる！\n お前の くだらん野望に 振りまわされて\n:
Ka~! What are you talking about? We've all
suffered so much because of your stupid
ambitions!

21124.「お前の亡くなった親父さん…… ホルタ神父は\n 本当に アグラニに尽くした 人:
Your late father... Father Holta was a man of
character who was truly devoted to Agrani. And
you, his daughter...

21125.「うるさい！ 父さんは 関係ないでしょ！\n あたしは この世界で のし上がるた:
Shut up! You're not my problem! I will do
whatever it takes to get ahead in this
world! That's how I do it!

21126.「ふん。お前には 何を言ってもムダだな。\n オレは 礼状なんか書かねえぞ。\n:
Hmm. Nothing I can say will make sense to you.
I'm not writing you a thank-you note. Get the
hell out of here!

21128.「おっと すまねえ！ 来てくれてたのか。\n ご苦労だったな。さあ こっちに来て:
Oops, sorry! I didn't know you were here.
Thanks for your hard work. Come on, let's hear
all about it.

21130.「……ほう。オレが襲われた場所に\n 賢者ブロッゲンさまが 現れたってのか。\n:
Oh... Sage Broggen appeared at the place where
I was attacked? That's a coincidence. So what
happened?

21131.「……なっ なんだと！？\n オレを襲った魔物は 魂を吸い取る\n 恐ろしい魔獣:
What? The monster that attacked me was a
terrifying soul-sucking hexenbiest?

21132.「しかも その魔獣ビュブロスって野郎は\n アグラニを 襲うつもりでいただと……:
And this Magical Beast Byblos was planning to
attack Agrani...? This is crazy...

21133.「ま…まあ あの賢者ブロッゲンさまが\n なんとかしてくれるってえなら 安心か…:
Well...if that Sage Broggen is going to take
care of it, I guess I can rest easy...that's
the best thing that could have happened to me.

21134.「よし！ ご苦労だったな。\n オレを襲った魔物の件は よ～くわかったぜ。\n:
All right! Thanks for your help. I understand
the monster that attacked me. Now, here's your
reward. Take it.

21135.「あなた どこかで会ったかしら？\n まあ もし そうだとしても\n あたしは:
Do I know you from somewhere? Well, if I did,
I don't remember it at all.

21136.「でも インパクトに欠ける 顔に似合わず\n ずいぶんと 面白いネタを持ってるの:
But for someone with a face that lacks impact,
you sure have a lot of interesting material.
I'm interested in you.

21137.「謎の魔獣に 賢者ブロッゲン……。\n その話 今度 ゆっくり\n 聞かせてもら:
Mysterious Hexenbiests and Sage Broggen...
we'll have to hear all about it sometime...

28517.「……で どうだったい？\n オレを襲った魔物の正体 わかったか？:
So... how'd it go? Did you find out what kind
of monster attacked me?

28518.<pc>は ホッツィ親方に\nガタラ原野での出来事を 話した。:
<pc> tells Hotzi what happened
in the Gatara Fields.

29448.「危ないところだったね。\n あの光線に さわったら最後……。\n あそこの旅人:
That was a close call. If I had touched that
beam of light, I would have ended up like that
traveler over there.
